script:
;;3:儀式
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# textflame 0 0
# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# textflame 0 0
# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# textflame 0 0
@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0006"
# textflame 1 1
@草薙剣
さてさて！
そちの学びの成果を
試すとするかのう！

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# textflame 1 1
@草薙剣
そちは誰よりも余について
詳しくあらねばならぬ！

# voice 1004 "kusanagi_0036"
# face %(unit_a)s "angry"
# textflame 1 1
@草薙剣
余の問いに
よどみなく答えてみせよ！

# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@草薙剣
余はな“あれ”をするのが
好きなのじゃ！
ほれ、答えてみよ！

# se "SE_0734"
# select "狩り" "select_label_1" "料理" "select_label_2" "儀式" "select_label_3"
余はな“あれ”をするのが
好きなのじゃ！
ほれ、答えてみよ！

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
